misc: Operates the Hector organization's digital media properties
Gotten increasingly close to winning the Hector Trophée but hasn't quite gotten it done yet
biography: Lasse, a familiar face from Tapiola Golf, is set to make his ninth appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025. Beyond his undeniable presence on the course, Lasse is also the person responsible for the Hector organization's digital media properties.

While the coveted Hector Trophée title has eluded him thus far, those who know Lasse know that he is persistent and ambitious. His supporters say that his performance has improved year after year, and they say that it is only a matter of time before Lasse finally takes home the trophy.
Whether or not he can finally get the job done and bring home the trophy, Lasse's dedication to the sport makes him one of the key figures at the Hector Trophée.
